tiles.title: LAD/WAD Overall Population count
tiles.query:
//LAD/WAD for all Installed or Enabled Count
cluster('azcore.centralus.kusto.windows.net').database('Fa').
GuestAgentExtensionEvents
| where TIMESTAMP between (now(-90d) .. now())
| where OperationSuccess == true
| where Name in~ ( "microsoft.azure.diagnostics.iaasdiagnostics","microsoft.azure.diagnostics.paasdiagnostics","microsoft.azure.diagnostics.edp.iaasdiagnostics","microsoft.azure.diagnostics.edp.paasdiagnostics","microsoft.azure.diagnostics.linuxdiagnostic", "microsoft.ostcextensions.linuxdiagnostic","microsoft.ostcextensions.edp.linuxdiagnostic")
| where Operation in ( "Install", "Enable", "OnPluginInstallEnd", "OnPluginEnableEnd")
| project
    VMId
| summarize
    TotalResourceCount = dcount(VMId)

tiles.title: Windows (WAD) Population count
tiles.query:
//WAD Installed or Enabled Count
cluster('azcore.centralus.kusto.windows.net').database('Fa').
GuestAgentExtensionEvents
| where TIMESTAMP between (now(-90d) .. now())
| where Name in~ ( "microsoft.azure.diagnostics.iaasdiagnostics","microsoft.azure.diagnostics.paasdiagnostics","microsoft.azure.diagnostics.edp.iaasdiagnostics","microsoft.azure.diagnostics.edp.paasdiagnostics")
| where Operation in ( "Install", "Enable", "OnPluginInstallEnd", "OnPluginEnableEnd")
| where OperationSuccess == true
| project
    VMId
| summarize
    TotalResourceCount = dcount(VMId)

tiles.title: Linux (LAD) population count
tiles.query:
//LAD Installed or Enabled Count
cluster('azcore.centralus.kusto.windows.net').database('Fa').
GuestAgentExtensionEvents
| where TIMESTAMP between (now(-90d) .. now())
| where OperationSuccess == true
| where Name in~ ("microsoft.azure.diagnostics.linuxdiagnostic", "microsoft.ostcextensions.linuxdiagnostic","microsoft.ostcextensions.edp.linuxdiagnostic")
| where Operation in ( "Install", "Enable", "OnPluginInstallEnd", "OnPluginEnableEnd")
| project
    VMId
| summarize
    TotalResourceCount = dcount(VMId)

tiles.title: WAD Version breakdown
tiles.query:
//WAD Version breakdown
//WAD Pop by agent version
cluster('azcore.centralus.kusto.windows.net').database('Fa').
GuestAgentExtensionEvents
| where TIMESTAMP between (now(-90d) .. now())
| where OperationSuccess == true
| where Name in~ ( "microsoft.azure.diagnostics.iaasdiagnostics","microsoft.azure.diagnostics.paasdiagnostics","microsoft.azure.diagnostics.edp.iaasdiagnostics","microsoft.azure.diagnostics.edp.paasdiagnostics")
| where Operation in ( "Install", "Enable", "OnPluginInstallEnd", "OnPluginEnableEnd")
| project
    Version,
    VMId
| summarize
    TotalResourceCount = dcount(VMId) by Version
| where TotalResourceCount > 0
| sort by TotalResourceCount

tiles.title: LAD Version breakdown
tiles.query:
//LAD Version breakdown
//LAD Pop by agent version
cluster('azcore.centralus.kusto.windows.net').database('Fa').
GuestAgentExtensionEvents
| where TIMESTAMP between (now(-90d) .. now())
| where OperationSuccess == true
| where Name in~ ("microsoft.azure.diagnostics.linuxdiagnostic", "microsoft.ostcextensions.linuxdiagnostic","microsoft.ostcextensions.edp.linuxdiagnostic")
| where Operation in ( "Install", "Enable", "OnPluginInstallEnd", "OnPluginEnableEnd")
| project
    Version,
    VMId
| summarize
    TotalResourceCount = dcount(VMId) by Version
| where TotalResourceCount > 0
| sort by TotalResourceCount
